Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=US-ASCII;
	format=flowed;
	delsp=yes
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,

Yesterday I opened up the Heritrix 1.14.3 edit configuration window  
for each of my jobs running on 5 different machines.
I was comparing the settings in the different windows and was  
interrupted (the windows remained open).
I went back to the browser window today and found that each of my jobs  
on each of the machines had a status of:

Finished - Ended by operator

Some of the jobs had been running for two months. Oh well...

Best,

Derek
--Apple-Mail-34--48916930
Content-Type: text/html;
	charset=US-ASCII
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
